clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Treatment of hypertension alone or as an adjunct

contraindications.disease: Hypotension and diarrhea are most common
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Azilsartan medoxomil decreases the pressor effect of angiotensin II In response angiotensin I angiotensin II and renin are increased while aldosterone is decreased

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of orthostatic hypotension and syncope can be increased when Azilsartan medoxomil is combined with Duloxetine
The risk or severity of hypotension and orthostatic hypotension can be increased when Azilsartan medoxomil is combined with Levodopa
Azilsartan medoxomil may increase the hypotensive activities of Risperidone
The risk or severity of hyperkalemia can be increased when Aliskiren is combined with Azilsartan medoxomil
The risk or severity of hypotension hyperkalemia and reduced intravascular volume can be increased when Canagliflozin is combined with Azilsartan medoxomil
